alert.note: Alert for Bakersfield; Buttonwillow - Lost Hills - I5; Delano-Wasco-Shafter; West Side Mountains South of 198 (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 19 at 4:25PM PDT by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN KERN COUNTY THROUGH 515 PM PDT... At 424 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Shafter, or 19 miles west of Bakersfield, moving northwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Shafter, Rosedale, Lost Hills, Buttonwillow, Belridge, and Harris Ranch. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Bakersfield; Buttonwillow - Lost Hills - I5; Delano-Wasco-Shafter; West Side Mountains South of 198
